verses.name: Ezra 4:20
verses.text: There have been mighty kings also over Jerusalem, which have ruled over all countries beyond the river; and toll, tribute, and custom, was paid unto them.

verses.name: Ezra 4:21
verses.text: Give ye now commandment to cause these men to cease, and that this city be not builded, until another commandment shall be given from me.

verses.name: Ezra 4:22
verses.text: Take heed now that ye fail not to do this: why should damage grow to the hurt of the kings?
